name: Resment.GitHub.io
body:
### Welcome to My GitHub Pages.
My name is Simin Lyu. You can just call me Resment. In the summer of 2015, I will graduate form Tianjin University in Tianjin, China. I'm a prospective product manager. And I'm working for that. 


### Support or Contact

note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
